review: Nice and snappy but way too many shortcomings for the way I had hoped to use it, here's a list:1. USB is not enabled, and even when they do do that, it wont play files from an external hard drive.  But Roku will, so switching to that.2. If you don't password protect against accidental purchases, like if your kids are going to use this, then guess what, accidental purchases will ensue.  If you do password protect, then your kid can't use it, which is a drag.3. If netflix has a show you can watch for "free" (I realize it's not actually free, but you know what I mean) but Amazon has the show for a price, and you use voice command to summon said show, guess which one they will serve you?  Yep, their version that costs.  Can't blame them, but that just seems slimy.
author: Phillip C. Cornish
